title: Furious NYPD Defiantly Live Fact-Checked Trump’s “Stop-and-Frisk” Lies At Debate

Furious NYPD Defiantly Live Fact-Checked Trump’s “Stop-and-Frisk” Lies At Debate
0 Shares
Read Next
Donald Trump, the supposed “law and order” candidate, painted a very bleak picture of what life in the “inner cities” was like. “We have a situation where we have inner cities, African-Americans, Hispanics are living in hell because it’s so dangerous” said the Republican nominee a few hours earlier. He cited former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani’s unconstitutional and discriminatory “stop-and-frisk” policy as a solution for crime in urban centers.
But his account didn’t match up with the facts, and he was called out by the police department in his own city for his blatant falsehoods and the implication that the NYPD isn’t good at their jobs. The Assistant Commissioner for Communication & Public Information of the NYPD, J.
